title: Decoding the mechanism of self-discharge and optimal electrolyte reconfiguration for advanced vanadium-based aqueous zinc batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01208A, Paper
Jie Sun, Jin Zhang, Siyang Wang, Peiyan Sun, Jiahang Chen, Yuping Du, Shenghan Wang, Ismael Saadoune, Yizhan Wang, Yingjin Wei
The self-discharge of aqueous zinc batteries during idle periods remains elusive, and warranting adequate voltage and sufficient capacity is not trivial, due to the components of the battery system and the reciprocal influence among them.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
